taxonomy_description:
Definition: Customer enquiries related to the status, fulfillment, shipment, or delivery of an order after it has been placed.

Includes
- Order tracking and shipment updates
- Delivery delays or missed delivery windows
- Incorrect delivery address or rescheduling
- Claims that an order was not received

Excludes
- Damaged or defective items (see Product Issues)
- Returns or refunds (see Returns & Refunds)
- Business relevance: Logistics ops, courier coordination, SLA monitoring

Definition: Requests to return products, exchange items, or obtain refunds, including questions about return eligibility or policy.

Includes
- Product return requests
- Refund status checks
- Exchange or replacement requests
- Return policy clarification

Excludes
- Product quality complaints without a return request (see Product Defects & Fulfillment Errors)

Definition: Reports that a product is faulty, damaged, incorrect, missing components, or not functioning as expected.

Includes
- Damaged or broken items
- Wrong product delivered
- Missing parts or accessories
- Product malfunction or defect

Excludes
- Refund or exchange processing (see Returns, Refunds & Exchanges)

Definition: Questions or disputes about payments, charges, billing errors, invoices, or price mismatches.

Includes
- Double charges or overbilling
- Payment failures or declined payments
- Price inconsistencies across pages
- Unexpected fees or charges

Excludes
- Promo code or discount issues (see Promotions, Discounts & Loyalty)

Definition: Issues related to customer login, authentication, account security, or profile management.

Includes
- Login failures or password resets
- Locked or compromised accounts
- Updating personal or contact details
- Account closure or deactivation requests

Excludes
- General website or app bugs (see Technical & Platform Issues)

Definition: Problems caused by website or app malfunctions that prevent normal use of the service.

Includes
- Website loading failures
- Checkout or payment page errors
- Mobile app crashes
- Broken features or performance issues

Excludes
- Account credential or password problems (see Account Access & Customer Profile)
- Business relevance
- Engineering triage
- Platform reliability
- Incident management

Definition: Requests for product specifications, compatibility, availability, restock timing, or recommendations before purchase.

Includes
- Product features or specifications questions
- Stock availability checks
- Size, color, or compatibility enquiries
- Product comparison or recommendation requests

Excludes
- Post-purchase product issues (see Product Defects & Fulfillment Errors)
- Business relevance
- Sales enablement
- Merchandising optimization
- Conversion support

Definition: Queries about discount codes, promotional offers, loyalty rewards, or special pricing campaigns.

Includes
- Promo code errors or failures
- Discount eligibility questions
- Sale pricing confusion
- Loyalty points or rewards enquiries

Excludes
- General billing disputes (see Billing, Charges & Price Discrepancies)
- Business relevance
- Marketing attribution
- Conversion optimization
- Campaign performance tracking

Definition: Expressions of customer dissatisfaction, formal complaints, service escalations, or reputational risk.

Includes
- Formal complaints
- Requests to speak to a supervisor
- Strong negative sentiment
- Threats to cancel or leave negative reviews

Excludes
- Neutral service requests without dissatisfaction
- Business relevance
- Customer retention
- Service recovery
- Regulatory and reputational risk management

Definition: Conversations that do not clearly fit a single category, contain multiple unrelated intents, or lack sufficient detail for confident classification.

Includes
- Very short or vague enquiries
- Conversations with mixed topics
- Out-of-scope or unclear requests

Excludes
- Conversations with a clear primary topic
- Business relevance
- Taxonomy hygiene
- Emerging topic detection
- Dataset quality monitoring
